ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Poll results for eqbards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Are you able to hotkey Safe Fall? I use this skill just by falling off things, not by pressing a hot key for it. ... 38th level bard Clan Battlehammer
ygData.messageBody:
At 12:45 PM 9/12/00 +0000, eqbards@egroups.com wrote:
>The following eqbards poll is now closed. Here are the
>final results:
>
>
>POLL QUESTION: Please click on the link below to answer this
>survey question. *DO NOT RESPOND BY EMAIL* Votes
>are not counted by email.
>Question:
>Which of the following skills do you use
>regularly? (ie, have hotkeyed, can't live
>without, etc.)
>
>CHOICES AND RESULTS
>- Forage, 31 votes, 28.44%
>- Sneak, 9 votes, 8.26%
>- Safe Fall, 34 votes, 31.19%
>- Hide, 9 votes, 8.26%
>- Disarm Traps, 1 votes, 0.92%
>- Tracking, 24 votes, 22.02%
>- Pick Locks, 1 votes, 0.92%

Are you able to hotkey Safe Fall? I use this skill just by falling off
things, not by pressing a hot key for it.

---Windleaf Mistsong
38th level bard
Clan Battlehammer
Bertoxxulous
